thread.title: Perfect location but poor quality.
thread.title_full: Perfect location but poor quality. - Review of Row NYC Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 26Lenka2
title: Perfect location but poor quality.
text:
The hotel is located very well. Rooms are small but arranged in a comfortable way. They are not sound proof so if you stay on a low floor you will not sleep at night because of the noise coming from the street.
Unfortunately rooms are not clean. You will see dust in every corner. My shower was not clean and I found black long hair almost in every towel. There was also hair on my pillow.
